data.title: Economic Fun
data.statement:
You work at a company, and they ask you to find the total revenue, gross profit, and the gross profit margin.

Formulae:
<<Total revenue:>> Number of Units Sold * Price of Each Unit
<<Gross profit:>> Total Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold (COGS)
<<Gross profit margin:>> (Gross Profit / Total Revenue) * 100
data.constraints:
0 < [[N]], [[P]], [[C]] < 100,000,000
Gross profit will always be greater than zero.
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
read P:float
read C:float
write Total revenue, Gross profit, Gross profit margin
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] representing the number of units sold.
<<Line 2:>> A float [[P]] representing the price of each unit.
<<Line 3:>> A float [[C]] representing the cost of goods sold.
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> The total revenue with 2 decimal places and preceding with a {{$}}.
<<Line 2:>> The gross profit with 2 decimal places and preceding with a {{$}}.
<<Line 3:>> The gross profit margin as a percentage with 2 decimal places.
Round all results to the nearest hundredth. (Truncating won't work, you have to round)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You work at a company, and they ask you to find the total revenue, gross profit, and the gross profit margin.

Formulae:
Total revenue: Number of Units Sold * Price of Each Unit
Gross profit: Total Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold (COGS)
Gross profit margin: (Gross Profit / Total Revenue) * 100
Input
Line 1: An integer N representing the number of units sold.
Line 2: A float P representing the price of each unit.
Line 3: A float C representing the cost of goods sold.
Output
Line 1: The total revenue with 2 decimal places and preceding with a $.
Line 2: The gross profit with 2 decimal places and preceding with a $.
Line 3: The gross profit margin as a percentage with 2 decimal places.
Round all results to the nearest hundredth. (Truncating won't work, you have to round)
Constraints
0 < N, P, C < 100,000,000
Gross profit will always be greater than zero.
Example
Input
25
5
35
Output
$125.00
$90.00
72.00%
